com.microsoft.band.tiles

Class BandIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.band.tiles.BandIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public final class BandIcon
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable

    Wrapper class for bitmaps that will be converted into icons on a Microsoft Band

    Internally represented as an alpha only 4-bit bitmap

    • Nested Class Summary
